pages.text: $(o)"When the Nothingness relinquished its grip from existence，one stood。He chose the path of unending dreams，as he knew，or at least thought to know，that nothing can exist，where Nothingness once was。And thus he fell asleep."$()

pages.title: 印记
pages.text: 想要制作它的印记，你需要将 $(l:shaping/entry_drum)虚无之膜$()投入$(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)神耀仪式$()中。$(br)印记同样可以连接到祭坛，它会为祭坛提供$(marked)空无$()要素。

pages.title: 印记
pages.text: 当其升级为雕像后，当你向其祈祷时，这一雕像会向其源头证明，真的有人敢向它祈祷。
